    • Uses of Event in it.polimi.se2019.commons.mv_events

      Subclasses of Event in it.polimi.se2019.commons.mv_events 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AllowedMovementsEvent
      This event sends the user the list of positions they can move their target to.
      class  AllowedWeaponsEvent
      This event send the user the weapons they own and that are reloaded.
      class  BoardRefreshEvent
      This event is sent to the user in order to substitute the grabbed cards at the end of each turn.
      class  DisablePowerUpEvent
      This event is sent to the user in order to deactivate a power up that cannot be used any longer.
      class  DrawnPowerUpEvent
      This event is sent to all users to notify that a user drew a power up.
      class  EndOfMatchEvent
      This event is sent to all players when the match is over and the final points have been calculated.
      class  FinalFrenzyStartingEvent
      This event notifies all users when the last skull is removed from the killshot track and only in case final frenzy is activated.
      class  FinanceUpdateEvent
      This event notifies all users when the number of ammos owned by a player changes.
      class  GrabbablesEvent
      This event is sent to the user to ask them what they wish to grab.
      class  GrabbedLootCardEvent
      This event notifies all users when a loot card is grabbed.
      class  GrabbedWeaponEvent
      This event is sent to notify all users that a weapon was grabbed.
      class  HandshakeEndEvent
      This event communicates the users connected and playing and the map configurations available which were generated from the JSON files upon initialization of the game class.
      class  MatchConfigurationEvent
      This event notifies all users of the available configurations and of the players connected.
      class  MVCardEndEvent
      This event is sent whenever a card is over and cannot be used any longer.
      class  MVChooseAmmoToPayEvent
      This event sends the user the ammos available to pay for the price of a power up.
      class  MVDeathEvent
      This event is sent after the death of a player and notifies everyone of who killed them.
      class  MVDiscardPowerUpEvent
      This event is sent when a user discards a power up and everyone is notified.
      class  MVEndOfTurnEvent
      This event notifies all users that playerEnding has just finished playing and playerStarting is about to start.
      class  MvJoinEvent
      This event notifies all users when a new user enters the game.
      class  MVMoveEvent
      This event notifies all users when a player is moved.
      class  MVRespawnEvent
      This event is sent to a dead player when they have to respawn and a power up card is drawn for them.
      class  MVSelectionEvent 
      class  MVSellPowerUpEvent
      This event is sent when ammos are not enough to pay for the price of an action but the power ups owned by the author could cover the said price.
      class  MVWeaponEndEvent
      This event notifies the user that their weapon is over and cannot be used any longer.
      class  PartialSelectionEvent
      This event notifies the user of the target set, whether this effect can be skipped and whether the card is a weapon or a power up.
      class  PausedPlayerEvent
      This event notifies all users whenever a player is paused.
      class  PossibleEffectsEvent
      This event communicate to the user the possible effects they can use with the chosen card.
      class  PowerUpToLeaveEvent
      This event asks the user which power up they wish to leave.
      class  ReloadableWeaponsEvent
      This event communicates the user the reload prices of the weapons.
      class  SetUpEvent
      This event notifies all users about the final set up of the game.
      class  StartFirstTurnEvent
      This event notifies the first user of the match that their turn is starting and sends them two power ups to spawn.
      class  SyncEvent
      This event allows users to obtain all the missing information whenever they reconnect.
      class  TimerEvent
      This event notifies the ticking of a timer.
      class  TurnEvent
      This event communicates the user which combination of actions can be chosen by the player.
      class  UnpausedPlayerEvent
      This event notifies the user when a player is unpaused.
      class  UpdateHpEvent
      This event notifies all users when the hp of a player is updated, communicating the name of the player that attacked them.
      class  UpdateMarkEvent
      This event notifies all users whenever a player's marks are updated.
      class  UpdatePointsEvent
      This event notifies all users whenever a player's points are updated.
      class  UsablePowerUpEvent
      This event communicates a user that one of their power ups can be used and whether it costs.
      class  UsernameDeletionEvent
      This event communicates everyone whenever a user disconnects.
      class  WeaponToLeaveEvent
      This event communicates the users which weapons they own in order for them to choose one to discard.

    • Uses of Event in it.polimi.se2019.commons.vc_events

      Subclasses of Event in it.polimi.se2019.commons.vc_events 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CalculatePointsEvent
      Event sent when the match is over in order to allow the DeathController to calculate the points at the end of the match.
      class  ChosenComboEvent
      This event is sent from the user in order to communicate the combo (eg: Run Around, Shoot People, Grab Stuff,...) they wish to use.
      class  ChosenEffectEvent
      This event communicates the effect of the chosen weapon the user wishes to use.
      class  ChosenEffectPowerUpEvent
      This event is used to communicate the chosen power up effect the user wishes to apply.
      class  ChosenWeaponEvent
      This event communicates the chosen weapon to use amongst those owned by the user and reloaded.
      class  DiscardedPowerUpEvent
      This event communicates the power up the user wishes to discard.
      class  DiscardedWeaponEvent
      This event communicates the weapon the user wishes to discard.
      class  DisconnectionEvent
      This event notifies the disconnection or reconnection of a user during the game.
      class  GrabEvent
      This event communicates the card the user decided to grab.
      class  PowerUpUsageEvent
      This event communicates that the user wishes to use a power up they own.
      class  ReloadEvent
      This event communicates that the user wishes to reload the listed weapons.
      class  SpawnEvent
      This event allows the player to spawn on a spawn tile of the same colour of the discarded power up.
      class  VCCardEndEvent
      This event is sent from the view when receiving a MVWeaponEndEvent.
      class  VCChooseAmmoToPayEvent
      This event is sent when a user decides which ammo to use to pay when using a power up that requires a payment.
      class  VCEndOfTurnEvent
      This event is sent to the Controller when a user wishes to end their turn before the possible actions they can do are over.
      class  VCFinalFrenzy 
      class  VcJoinEvent
      This event is sent when a new user joins match making.
      class  VcMatchConfigurationEvent
      This event is sent when a user sends their preferred playing options in the set up phase.
      class  VCMoveEvent
      This event is sent when a user moves its player.
      class  VCPartialEffectEvent
      This event is sent when a user is using a weapon or a power up effect and they choose who to apply the effect to.
      class  VcReconnectionEvent
      This event is sent upon reconnection of a user.
      class  VCSellPowerUpEvent
      This event is sent when a user chooses the power ups they wish to sell in order to pay for the price of an action.
      class  VCWeaponEndEvent
      This event is sent when a weapon usage is over.
